channel.title: eZ components release feed
channel.description: This feed shows all the latest components releases.

item.title: UserInput 1.0.1
item.description: - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class. - Updated documentation.
item.content:encoded:
- Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.
- Updated documentation.

item.title: Translation 1.1.1
item.description: - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class and properties approach.
item.content:encoded: - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class and properties approach.

item.title: SystemInformation 1.0.1
item.description: - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.
item.content:encoded: - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.

item.title: PhpGenerator 1.0.1
item.description: - Updated documentation. - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.
item.content:encoded:
- Updated documentation.
- Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.

item.title: Mail 1.1.2
item.description: - Added the ezcMailPop3Transport::fetchByMessageNr() method that returns an ezcMailPop3Set containing the message with the specified number. - Fixed bug #8736: variable transport non-functional. - Fixed bug that caused the contentId property of the ezcMailFile class not to be set even if it was available for the related part while parsing multipart/related messages. - PHP 5.2 compatibility.
item.content:encoded:
- Added the ezcMailPop3Transport::fetchByMessageNr() method that returns an
  ezcMailPop3Set containing the message with the specified number.
- Fixed bug #8736: variable transport non-functional.
- Fixed bug that caused the contentId property of the ezcMailFile class not to
  be set even if it was available for the related part while parsing
  multipart/related messages.
- PHP 5.2 compatibility.

item.title: ImageConversion 1.1.1
item.description: - Fixed bug #8712: The x and y parameters for cropping where handled as coordinates and not as offsets. - Refactored to use new ezcBaseStruct and properties approach.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed bug #8712: The x and y parameters for cropping where handled as 
  coordinates and not as offsets.
- Refactored to use new ezcBaseStruct and properties approach.

item.title: Execution 1.0.1
item.description: - Documentation updates.
item.content:encoded: - Documentation updates.

item.title: EventLog 1.0.2
item.description: - Refactored to use new ezcBaseStruct class and new properties approach.
item.content:encoded: - Refactored to use new ezcBaseStruct class and new properties approach.

item.title: Debug 1.0.1
item.description: - Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class. - PHP 5.2 compatibility.
item.content:encoded:
- Refactored to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.
- PHP 5.2 compatibility.

item.title: DatabaseSchema 1.0.2
item.description: - Fixed bug #8900: Problem with auto increment and primary keys for MySQL because the skip_primary context was not reset for new tables. - Added a new validator to check whether columns marked as 'auto_increment' actually have a primary key defined as well. - Implemented FR #8901: Written schemas should indent the XML. - Refactored the structs to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed bug #8900: Problem with auto increment and primary keys for MySQL
  because the skip_primary context was not reset for new tables.
- Added a new validator to check whether columns marked as 'auto_increment'
  actually have a primary key defined as well.
- Implemented FR #8901: Written schemas should indent the XML.
- Refactored the structs to use the new ezcBaseStruct class.

item.title: Database 1.1.2
item.description: - Fixed bug #8835: Documentation of lOr and lAnd.
item.content:encoded: - Fixed bug #8835: Documentation of lOr and lAnd.

item.title: ConsoleTools 1.1.2
item.description: - Fixed bug #8738: Unexpected behaviour with options->colPadding. - Fixed bug #8478: ezcConsoleOutput format (foreground) color 'black' not available. (The fore-/background colors black and gray are now the same and available for fore- and background). - PHP 5.2 compatibility.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed bug #8738: Unexpected behaviour with options->colPadding.
- Fixed bug #8478: ezcConsoleOutput format (foreground) color 'black' not
  available. (The fore-/background colors black and gray are now the same and
  available for fore- and background).
- PHP 5.2 compatibility.

item.title: Configuration 1.0.3
item.description: - Refactored to use new ezcBaseStruct class to inherit all the structs from.
item.content:encoded: - Refactored to use new ezcBaseStruct class to inherit all the structs from.

item.title: Cache 1.1.2
item.description: - Refactored property handling.
item.content:encoded: - Refactored property handling.

item.title: Base 1.1.1
item.description: - Added the ezcBaseStruct class from which all structs in all components should inherit from.
item.content:encoded:
- Added the ezcBaseStruct class from which all structs in all components
  should inherit from.

item.title: Mail 1.1.1
item.description:
- Partially fixed bug #8694:
* Don't crash when generating empty mail. * Don't assume that message/ parts are actually rfc822 messages when parsing mail.
item.content:encoded:
- Partially fixed bug #8694:

  * Don't crash when generating empty mail.
  * Don't assume that message/ parts are actually rfc822 messages when parsing
    mail.

item.title: Database 1.1.1
item.description: - Fixed bug #8360: ezcQueryExpressionOracle::concat() calls non-existing method. - Added ezcQuery::resetBinds() which allows you to reset the bound values and parameters associated with a query.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed bug #8360: ezcQueryExpressionOracle::concat() calls non-existing
  method.
- Added ezcQuery::resetBinds() which allows you to reset the bound values and
  parameters associated with a query.

item.title: ConsoleTools 1.1.1
item.description: - Fixed bug #8525: ConsoleInput::getHelpTable() exits with a fatal error. - Fixed bug #8645: Default values not set correctly in ezcConsoleInput.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed bug #8525: ConsoleInput::getHelpTable() exits with a fatal error.
- Fixed bug #8645: Default values not set correctly in ezcConsoleInput.

item.title: Cache 1.1.1
item.description: - Updated tutorial with a new example.
item.content:encoded: - Updated tutorial with a new example.

item.title: DatabaseSchema 1.0.1
item.description: - Fixed a bug that an empty 'is null value' string in the database caused a PHP warning.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed a bug that an empty 'is null value' string in the database caused a 
  PHP warning.

item.title: TranslationCacheTiein 1.1
item.description: - No changes.
item.content:encoded: - No changes.

item.title: Translation 1.1
item.description: - No changes.
item.content:encoded: - No changes.

item.title: Template 1.0
item.description: - Fixed a bug that some indentations were not removed. - Fixed a bug that the newlines after a non output block were not removed. - Fixed a bug that fetching an array element was never considered as a possible sub array. E.g. {var $a = array( array("a") )} {foreach $a[0] as $i} gave an error. - Fixed a bug that an imported variable with default value got the wrong type. E.g. {var $myArray = false} {foreach $myArray as $i} gave an error.
item.content:encoded:
- Fixed a bug that some indentations were not removed.
- Fixed a bug that the newlines after a non output block were not removed. 
- Fixed a bug that fetching an array element was never considered as a
  possible sub array. E.g. {var $a = array( array("a") )} {foreach $a[0] as $i}
  gave an error.
- Fixed a bug that an imported variable with default value got the wrong type. 
  E.g. {var $myArray = false} {foreach $myArray as $i} gave an error.

item.title: SystemInformation 1.0
item.description: - Fixed small CS issues.
item.content:encoded: - Fixed small CS issues.

item.title: PersistentObjectDatabaseSchemaTiein 1.0
item.description: - Fixed bug #8401: PersistentObjectDatabaseSchemaTieIn error if environment is not correct.
item.content:encoded:
